alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:42PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Giles County through 715 PM CDT... At 641 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Pulaski to 10 miles north of Ardmore. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pulaski, Ardmore, Elkton, Minor Hill, Goodspring, Frankewing and Prospect. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
